points.title: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution
points.status: The content of the web-site is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

points.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
points.status: The privacy policy states: "The web-site collects and stores a part of visitor’s IP-address and the full User-Agent string in its access logs." and "This web-site collects the following data of its visitors: part of the IP-address (except the last octet value). The last octet is replaced with a random value, therefore IP addresses are anonymized"

points.title: This service does not track you
points.status: The privacy policy states: "This web-site respects your privacy and does not track you: it does NOT use cookies, it does NOT use any tracking systems, it does NOT use any 3rd-party service that can track visitors of the web-site"

points.title: Your personal data is not sold
points.status: The privacy policy states: "This data is used solely by the owner of the web-site for access logs and debugging purposes. This data is never published anywhere or shared with a 3rd-party. It’s NOT used for marketing, advertising or any other commercial purpose."

points.title: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms
points.status: The privacy policy states: "it does NOT use any tracking systems, it does NOT use any 3rd-party service that can track visitors of the web-site"

points.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
points.status: The privacy policy states: "This data is used solely by the owner of the web-site for access logs and debugging purposes. This data is never published anywhere or shared with a 3rd-party. It’s NOT used for marketing, advertising or any other commercial purpose."

points.title: No need to register
points.status: The privacy policy states: "Visitors are able to access the web-site in read-only mode"

points.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
points.status: The privacy policy states: "The web-site collects and stores a part of visitor’s IP-address and the full User-Agent string in its access logs. This web-site does not collect any other data unless it’s stated in this document."
